textContent:
If I stop centering my life on work im scared I'm giving up a meaningful career where I get status and accolades and a feeling of worth and validation and praise. 

Gil and Ben have represented the opposite focus of work. A focus on family and on them. On building with them instead of separate. But I have been so stuck and traumatized about losing something that I have spent all my energy on trying to build a business. 

The focus on my boss or work or colleagues  has represented my focus on fullfilmet through work. 

I'm giving up a family with Gil where the #1 priority is the family and building a family with each other. I'm scared that in turning more towards my work I'll actually be destroying the very family structure I want and value. It will be putting a new family structure in place that's centered around work and purpose not on interpersonal relationships for the sake of love
